snippet: President Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz of Mauritania was “lightly wounded” after a military patrol accidentally fired on his convoy, the government said Saturday.
lead_paragraph: President Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz of Mauritania was “lightly wounded” after a military patrol accidentally fired on his convoy, the government said Saturday.

headline.seo: Mauritania’s President Accidentally Wounded, Officials Say
headline.main: Mauritania’s President Is Wounded in Accidental Shooting, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Mauritania’s President Wounded in Accidental Shooting, Officials Say
